class.name: JoltSoftBody3DSettings
class.brief_description: Soft body settings with additional settings for use with the Jolt physics engine.
class.description: A subclass of [SoftBody3DSettings] that contains additional settings for Jolt's soft body functionality.

method.name: calculate_volume_constraint_volumes
method.description: Set the rest volume of each volume constraint based on the rest vertex positions. Each volume's rest volume will be multiplied by [param multiplier].
